alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 11:57AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory has been extended through 3 pm this afternoon... * Another gust front from the north-northeast will pass through the islands for the next couple of hours. This weather pattern will produce gusty winds up to 50 mph with heavy downpours... * TIMING...through 3 pm this afternoon * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1157 TAEAO ASO TOFI FEPUARI 23 2023 ...Ua fa`aauau le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI e oo i le 3 i le aoauli nei... * O savili agi fa`ata`uta`u mai matu-matu i sasa`e o le a o`o mai i luga o le atunu`u mo nai isi itula. O nei savili agi fa`ata`uta`u o le mafai ona o`o atu i le 50 mph fa`apea timuga mamafa... * TAIMI...seia oo i le 3 i le aoauli nei * AAFIAGA...E ono pauu laau, lelea mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma e faaleagaina foi apa ma taualuga o fale. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi, o lona uiga o savili e 35 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u i le 50 mph, o loo aafia ai le atunu`u. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Fa`amolemole ia e fa`aeteete.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH gusting to 50 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
